description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

description: The Butterfield Card Alerts application is a product of Butterfield. Monitor your debit and credit cards activity by downloading the Butterfield Card Alerts app to your smartphone or tablet. Set customised alerts for your Signature, Chip and PIN, or Contactless transactions. Track all transactions or set alerts for purchases over a certain threshold.

There’s never been a better time to check out PayPal, the trusted way to pay
Say hello to PayPal+, our free loyalty programme that helps you make the most of your money every time you shop with PayPal

SEND & RECEIVE MONEY​
A simple, secure way to quickly send & receive money to friends and family. With encryption technology, we go the distance to help make sure your money transfers are secure

ITS LOYALTY FOR ALL. AND ITS ALL FOR FREE
PayPal+ is the loyalty programme that rewards you with more points, in more ways. Use them almost anywhere PayPal is accepted. And it’s all for free, with no fees and no caps*​
*Rewards are earned as points under the PayPal+ rewards programme. To start earning, you must be enrolled in PayPal+. If you are not yet enrolled, you can sign in the PayPal app. PayPal+ Terms and conditions apply.

MULTIPLY YOUR POINTS WITH THE PAYPAL DEBIT CARD​
Earn up to 10x PayPal+ points when you pay with your PayPal Debit Card, everywhere Mastercard® is accepted. Add it to your mobile wallet, use it in person, and at PayPal checkout to watch your points grow*​
* Set up and activation required. Terms and conditions apply

BUY NOW, PAY LATER​
Keep track of all your PayPal Pay in 3 repayments.* Plus, earn points whenever you use Pay in 3
*Pay in 3 subject to status. Unregulated credit. Available for purchases £20-£3000. Consider if affordable and impact on other borrowing

SEND MONEY GLOBALLY
Send money to friends and family abroad in over 110 countries – or get even more delivery options with Xoom
*Fees and restrictions apply. Transaction, currency conversion, and other fees may apply

MANAGE YOUR SUBSCRIPTIONS ​
Keep track of your different subscriptions at the subscription hub. Easily view, update, or cancel subscriptions, while enjoying updates on recurring payments. Manage recurring payments all in one place. 

POOL MONEY TOGETHER​
Collect money in advance for group gifts, shared experiences, and more and skip the hassle of reimbursement afterward.​
*An account with PayPal is required to create a Pool. Terms and limits apply

PAY HOW YOU WANT​
Add your debit or credit cards* or link your bank accounts for extra flexibility at checkout. You’ll even be able to continue collecting rewards points**
*Using your credit card through your PayPal wallet may impact your rights under Section 75 of the Consumer Credit Act. This means you may lose the right to hold the merchant or your credit card provider jointly liable if you don’t get the goods or services you paid for (if they cost between £100 and £30,000)​
**Subject to issuer’s applicable reward programme terms and conditions

Join the 60+ million customers worldwide who use our app to spend, send, and save smarter.

This description is relevant for UK residents only.

Make your spend, well-spent

- Pay any way, with physical cards, virtual cards, single-use virtual cards for extra protection, Google or Apple Pay — you name it
- Spend abroad like a local with great exchange rates (fees additional to the rate provided may apply)
- Easily track and analyse your spending
- Link your external bank accounts to Revolut to stay on top of all your spending in one place
- Design a physical card you vibe with (fees may apply). Want to add a little luxury? Upgrade to Metal for a shiny steel card
- Not enough? Level up to Ultra to bag an exclusive platinum-plated card (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply)
- Set your kids up for financial success. Get them a free Revolut ＜18 account, with their own card, so they can learn about money in a safe and fun way

Send money near, far, wherever they are

- Request or send 30+ currencies with a tap to anyone, anywhere
- Chat, send, and receive money, in one place. Whatever your plans, transfers are instant between your Revolut friends
- No more awkward money chats! Split, chat, and settle bills in one place. You can even share a fun GIF to diffuse any tension

Save the interest-ing way

- Grow your money in GBP, EUR, and USD, with annual interest paid daily, directly into your account
- Access your savings whenever you need to, with zero penalties or fees
- Build your savings effortlessly — set up recurring transfers and round up spare change to stash cash without even trying

Explore investments (Capital at risk. Content is for UK residents only)

- Start investing from $1 (other fees may apply)
- Choose from 2,000+ stocks to invest in some of the world's most popular companies
- Enjoy commission-free stock trading within your monthly allowance (other fees may apply)
- Access our trading Learn courses and quizzes

Investment services are provided by Revolut Trading Ltd (No. 11567840) which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FRN: 933846). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.
End the overspend

- Get instant spending notifications to keep track of every payment
- Use smart budgeting and analytics tools to stop wondering where your money went, and start telling it where to go
- Worried about missing upcoming payments or subscription charges? Don’t be — we’ll notify you beforehand

Looking to go even further? Upgrade to one of our paid plans to get exclusive cards, more benefits, even cooler perks, you name it. Pick the plan that’s right for you: Plus, Premium, Metal or Ultra (Paid Plan T&Cs and subscription fees apply).

Unlock security features that you control

- Freeze and unfreeze your card in a tap
- Use single-use cards with details that regenerate each time, for an extra layer of protection
- Set spending limits and get notifications to keep track of your money

How we protect your money

- Your savings are protected by the FSCS through our partner banks – up to £85k. Subject to eligibility, visit the FSCS website for more information
- Our sophisticated fraud prevention system flags high-risk transactions and pings you an alert, so you can spot scams and nip ‘em in the bud
- It’s our business to protect your data, and we take it seriously. Extensive identity verification keeps sign-ups secure, and your account is protected with passcodes and biometrics
- We’re available 24/7 via our in-app customer support

Revolut Ltd (No. 08804411) is authorised by the Financial Conduct Authority under the Electronic Money Regulations 2011 (FRN: 900562). Registered address: 30 South Colonnade, London E14 5HX, United Kingdom.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

developer: The Bank of N. T. Butterfield & Son Ltd.
description:
With Butterfield Online, you can securely access your money whenever and wherever you need to.

The Butterfield Online mobile banking application allows you to:

•	Review transactions & check current balances
•	Transfer money and pay bills
•	View statements and other important documents online
•	See credit card transactions
•	Create real-time alerts for account transactions
•	Open new accounts based upon source account; currency and relationship
•	Order bank products
•	Communicate with us through your secure Butterfield mailbox

NOTE: You must have an active account and have completed an online application in order to use Butterfield Online Banking.

In a nutshell, we’re where the world charts, chats and trades markets. Over 100 million people use our social network and supercharged supercharts to make better, brighter decisions when they trade. Download our app to access free charts, alerts, advanced watchlists, plus discuss latest trends with other traders and much, much more. Here’s a fuller feature set: 

World-leading charts
A trader’s rite of passage, charts power insight. Millions use ours – for free – to make better decisions in the markets. Our charts work on any device and outperform many desktop trading platforms. You’ll be able to search for stocks, currencies, cryptos, futures, CFDs and more. A wide range of drawing tools (like Gann Fans and Elliott Waves) and technical indicators will also help you analyze price action.

Simple Pine Script for complex tools
From coding to chart analysis, faster than ever before — we crafted our programming language to give you the power to create custom tools. Pine Script is elegantly minimalist, pre-integrated with data, and breaking your analysis limits.

Bar Replay to hit rewind on past insights 
Watch how pricing data unfolded historically. Rewind markets and review at speed and resolution you desire.

Unmissable alerts 
Trading alerts were never this powerful, flexible, and easy to use. Cloud-based, they are available on any device – get notified by email, app, desktop, or webhook when your alerts trigger.

Made to trade 
Trade directly on our charts – trade through top brokers integrated to our platform, or use Paper Trading to practice buying and selling securities without any of the risk.

One app to track them all
Get a comprehensive view of the financial markets with our app: live quotes, news, trends, financial statements, and fundamentals, all in one place at your fingertips – the fastest way to find all the data you need.

Total economics and corporate reports
Access the latest and upcoming economic events, world companies' earnings, and dividends, in one Calendar.

Watchlist what matters
Keep track of all your beloved stocks and currency pairs with our highly-customizable watchlists. Use them to see real-time price updates and be the first to know what’s moving in the markets – wherever you happen to be. 

Data. Data. Data, 
Gain access to real-time market data from exchanges in the US, Europe and Asia. Hundreds of thousands of financial symbols from 100+ exchanges are at your fingertips. Unless you have incredibly niche interests, you’ll find what you’re looking for.

Never trade alone again
Unleash your creativity onto the world markets by being part of the largest social network for traders and investors. With thousands of ideas and minds published daily and ability to customize and share your analysis, start building your following today.

Always at your fingertips
Our secure and reliable cloud-based infrastructure means you’ll always have access to the world of finance, 24/7. No unexpected downtime at a critical trading moment ever again.  

Terms of use: https://www.tradingview.com/policies/
Privacy policy: https://www.tradingview.com/privacy-policy/

The HSBC Bermuda app has been specially built for our customers*, with reliability at the heart of its design.

To Log on to this app you must be an HSBC Personal Internet Banking customer. If you are not yet registered, please visit https://www.hsbc.bm

Already a customer? Log on with your existing online banking details.

Download the new HSBC Bermuda app today to enjoy the freedom of banking on the go!

This App is designed for use in Bermuda. The products and services represented within this App are intended for Bermuda customers. 

This App is provided by HSBC Bank Bermuda Limited ('HSBC Bermuda') for the use of existing customers of HSBC Bermuda. Please do not download this App if you are not an existing customer of HSBC Bermuda.

HSBC Bermuda is authorised and regulated in Bermuda by the Bermuda Monetary Authority.

If you are outside of Bermuda, we may not be authorised to offer or provide you with the products and services available through this App in the country or region you are located or resident in.

HSBC Bank Bermuda Limited, of 37 Front Street, Hamilton Bermuda, which is licensed to conduct Banking and Investment Business by the Bermuda Monetary Authority.

Your bank in your pocket. It starts here. 

Not a Santander customer already? Well hi there!  Come on in and make yourself at home. Simply download the App and we'll guide you through an application to join us* 

Already a customer? Nice one! You can get started by using your usual log on details (Don't already have log on details? Visit santander.co.uk to register – it's quick & easy) 

Now, we're pretty proud of our App and we've got good reason to be - it's award winning* Not only that, but it's secure, fast and you can use it anywhere, anytime, which is great if you're bit of a night owl. 

Here's the basic lowdown on what you can do: 

•            check your balance and statements. We know, it's a pretty scary task to do after a big night out  

•            not sure if you've already paid for something? Search transactions will let you find out instantly 

•            transfer money between your Santander accounts. Perfect if you want to put some spare cash away for a rainy day, or save for that new car  

•            send money to other people. Which is great if you're splitting the bill  

•            check your Direct Debits and standing orders 

•            control your card, 'freeze' it in those moments where you're sure your cards somewhere in the house, just not sure where 

•            pay in cheques, up to £5k a day 

•            we've got some handy features like My Money Manager and My Home Manager. Let’s just say it'll make things a lot more 'insightful' 

•            thanks to biometrics, payment authorisation and discreet mode you can rest easy knowing you're banking securely.  

But you can do so much more too! 

Head on over to the "Products & Offers" section in our app to find out more. We can help you get to where you want to be  

That's enough reading for now, let's get stuck in. Tap "Download" and see for yourself. 

————————————————————————— 

We know, the small print can be kind of boring. But it's important too. So, here it is… 

 

(* 1) Applications are subject to status, eligibility, and credit scoring 

(* 2) Our app won an award - Best Digital Financial Inclusion Initiative 2024 at the Global Retail Banking Innovation Awards 

  

For full details of our product range, key facts documents and terms & conditions, visit www.santander.co.uk 

 

Remember: 

• Never share a One Time Passcode (OTP) or your Security Number with anyone. Not even a Santander employee. 

• Santander will never call to ask to log on to your mobile device or computer, or ask you to download any type of software 

 

Interest rates within our App Store images are for visual purposes and may not be the latest rates. 

 

Santander Mobile Banking will not run on devices that have been jailbroken. 

 

Please make sure you have the latest Apple software on your phone so that our app runs smoothly. Your device will need to be running iOS version 13 or above to use this app.  

 

Apple, Touch ID and Face ID are trademarks of Apple Inc. registered in the US and other countries. App store is a service mark of Apple Inc. 

 

Santander UK plc. Registered Office: 2 Triton Square, Regent's Place, London, NW1 3AN, United Kingdom. Registered Number 2294747. Registered in England and Wales. www.santander.co.uk. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority. Our Financial Services Register number is 106054. You can check this on the Financial Services Register by visiting the FCA’s website www.fca.org.uk/register. Santander and the flame logo are registered trademarks.

Nagad app facilitates your daily financial transaction needs like cash in, cash out, send money (P2P), mobile recharge etc. 

You will get notifications on your latest Nagad activity; see your transaction history, transaction summary etc. Nagad is soon to bring very exciting and innovative services in the market to meet customer needs and demands.

•	Languages: Support both Bangla and English
•	Secured Financial Service app: Nagad app is a very secured app. Nagad App requires your PIN number in two phases. First for login and second for every transaction you need to provide PIN number. 
•	Personalization: You can add your display name and can change your display picture.
•	No “send money” to wrong number: You can easily select the desired recipient from your contact list for fast and error-free money transfer. 
•	Scan QR Code for Cash out: Scan QR codes at Uddokta points for Cash Out
•	Mobile Recharge: Recharge mobile or pay postpaid mobile bills for the mobile network operators below:
o	Robi 
o	Airtel 
o	Teletalk 
o	Banglalink
o	Grameenphone 

For convenience, you can select frequently recharge amount from the screen. 
•	Statement: Exert greater control over your digital financial service account by accessing your detailed transaction history, and a monthly transaction summary.
•	One tap balance check: checking your balance is very easy through a single tap on the screen 
•	Notification: Receive notifications for your latest Nagad transactions.

We’re on a mission to make laundry less of a chore. So with our free Circuit Go app, you can quickly check availability, book a machine and start washing.

 

Instant, reliable payments, straight through the app
Simple to book – schedule your laundry in advance
Skip the queues – check machine availability in your laundry
Save some cash – in-app coupons add up to great savings
All on your phone – get notified when your cycle’s complete
 

Ready to wash? Visit nearest Circuit launderette, load your laundry, choose your machine and programme, and GO.

 

Please note: Circuit Go relies on your phone having an internet connection. As long as you're online in the laundry room, you can activate our machines and see how long’s left on your cycle.

 

Your Circuit Go app account works separately to the terminal you might see on the wall in your launderette. Rather just tap and go? Pay contactlessly through the terminal.

 

By downloading the Circuit Go app, you agree to the following terms:

You accept that you have a non-exclusive licence to use the app. You agree not to copy the app or infringe our intellectual property rights in the app.

 

There’s no minimum amount of top-up credit. Payments are processed through a third-party payment provider. Circuit won’t store your card details.

 

You can refund any part-used top-up credit yourself – use Withdrawing Balance in the Balance area in the app. Refunds incur an administration charge of £2.00. Your part-used credit will need to cover the £2.00 admin charged to be able to process the refund.

 

No refund will be processed for any free credit or coupons. Balance transfer coupons will expire 12 months after the date of purchase. Visit circuit.co.uk for more information.

Fast, transparent personal loans for UAE residents 
 
CashNow lets you secure an instant loan straight from your phone. Our simple 5-step application process can be completed in under five minutes and you can receive funds in their bank account within minutes after approval. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

What makes CashNow stand out? 

Real speed – apply, get a decision, and get approved - on the same day. 

Fixed, easy pricing – AED 150 processing fee plus a flat 6 % interest for the full three-month term. No hidden extra charges. 

Licensed & regulated – CashNow (Quantix Technologies) is licensed by the Central Bank of the UAE 

Paper-free – just your Emirates ID and basic details; no credit documents or bank documents 

Full control – track disbursement, repayment dates, and loan balance inside the app. 

Data security – Your personal information is safe with us.  

Options for everyone: We have variety of lending options from small loans starting from AED 100 to upto AED 30,000. Your repayment history and your credit behaviour can unlock various limits for you.  

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Simple cost example 
 

You choose to borrow AED 1,500 at a 3 month tenure:  
→ we deposit AED 1,350 in your account after deducting the AED 150 fee 
→ repay AED 530 each month for three months (total AED 1,590) 

Your repayment amount is fixed on day one—no surprises later. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Eligibility 

→ UAE residents aged 20 – 55 
→ Valid Emirates ID 
→ Regular monthly income 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

How to get your quick loan 

→ Download & install CashNow (it’s free). 
→ Sign up and KYC with Emirates ID  
→ Choose how much you need.  
→ Submit—fill out some basic details and submit. You get a near instant decision on your application 

Receive the money in your bank account if approved, usually within minutes. 
 

That’s it—no branch visits, no paperwork. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ 

Is CashNow safe? 
Yes. We are a licensed and regulated entity by Central Bank of UAE and comply with all UAE lending regulations. 

Can I repay early? 
Absolutely. Early settlement is allowed at any time with a small fee.  

What if I’m declined? 
Our risk algorithm updates frequently so make sure to keep applying every few days!! 
Your application status will not reflect your credit score. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Download CashNow today and solve your cash needs—fast, fair, and fully transparent. 

*T&C Apply

Sahm is your premier app to trade and invest in the Saudi and U.S. stock markets. Whether you're a seasoned trader or just starting your investment journey, our comprehensive financial service empowers you to trade stocks, options, Warrants and more. 

Key Features:
- Seamless Market Shifting: Manage your investments in both Saudi and U.S. markets with one portfolio in one app. Experience the seamless shift with just a tap.

- Instant Currency Exchange: Sahm users can easily exchange currencies from the comfort of their homes or while on the go with just a few clicks, thereby saving valuable time and making global markets more accessible than ever before.

- 3-minute Account Opening: Opening an investment account with Sahm is incredibly swift. This three-minute process ensures your investment journey begins promptly, allowing you to seize market opportunities sooner and respond to trends more quickly.

- Market variety: Engage in various financial products, such as stocks, REITs, Murabaha, Margin, Sukuk & Bonds, expanding your investment horizon.

- IPO Subscription: In Sahm App, investors are able to view information on upcoming IPOs and subscribe for it, early seizing investment opportunities.

- Shariah-compliant Stocks: Sahm simplifies the process of identifying Shariah-compliant stocks that align with your Islamic values and principles, ensuring your ethical considerations are always addressed.

- Competitive Trading Costs: Sahm provides the most competitive trading fees available, guaranteeing users can maximize their investment returns. 

- Powerful Quotes Chart: With Sahm's powerful quotes chart, users can explore the market dynamics with multiple technical indicators, all presented in a user-friendly and customized interface.

- Detailed market analysis: Sahm's advanced trading tool provides users with enhanced precision, automated trading capabilities, and a risk management system, resulting in heightened efficiency and greater flexibility for your trading strategies.

- Real time Market Updates: With access to real-time market data and personalized alerts for selected stocks, users can enhance their decision-making and remain at the forefront of today's swiftly changing financial environment.

- Comprehensive Investment Education: From stock market fundamentals to advanced trading techniques, Sahm offers a wide range of resources to cater to all your educational needs.

- Security and Trust: Powered by Sahm Capital, CMA license No. 22251-25.

- Unprecedented Trading Experience: We offer full access to our analysis tools, market insights, and investment education, even in visitor mode.

Contact Us:
Use Sahm App's “Send Feedback” feature or visit www.sahmcapital.com.
Email: cs@sahmcapital.com

Fedfina provides loan services in Gold Loan, Home Loan & Property Loan. ‘Fedfina Loans’ is the result of the commitment that we have towards our customers; therefore, we have designed this app to take a step forward in making our customers' lives easy & convenient. Why do customers love Fedfina?
· Highest Loan To Value
· Customer focused

All these achievements are a testimony of the trust, satisfaction & love that we have garnered over the years with the committed loan services that we offer. Our values are:

What does the app have in store for you?
· Apply for Loans
· Choose from a wide variety of schemes
· Locate your nearest branch from 700+ Fedfina branches
· Online Payments

· Doorstep Gold Loan & more
Key Highlights of the app Home: All your loan needs come to a halt at Fedfina. Explore various loan & scheme options to choose from with just a click.
Branch locator: Locating for loans near me made simple with the Fedfina Branch locator. Now search for your nearest branch from a list of 700+ Fedfina branches.
Doorstep Gold Loan: Apply for a Gold loan from the comfort of your home and get your gold evaluated in the privacy and safety of your home with an instant money transfer.
Online Payments: It provides an instant and quick online payment option for your EMIs/dues for Gold Loan, Home Loan & Property Loan through our secure payment gateway simply by clicking the Quick Pay option
Product Features for the loan: 
1. Get Loans for amounts ranging from Rs.3000 to Rs.5,000,0000
2. Interest rates ranging from 11.88% per annum - 23% per annum depending on the type of loan, profile & tenure
3. Processing fees ranging from 0.25% - 4% of the disbursal amount+ applicable taxes
4. Loan tenures ranging from 11 months to 30 years (based on the type of loan) How will the loan be calculated? Equated Monthly Installment (EMI): If you have a loan of Rs.3,00,000 for 5 years at a 15% interest rate, the EMI will be Rs. 7137. The total interest paid is Rs. 128219

Robinhood Wallet - Secure, Seamless, and Built for the Future of Crypto! 

Take full control of your crypto with Robinhood Wallet, the easy-to-use Web3 wallet designed for seamless digital asset management. Whether you're buying, storing, or swapping crypto, Robinhood Wallet empowers you with complete ownership and self-custody of your digital assets. 

Robinhood Wallet offers a non-custodial experience, giving you full control of your private keys while enabling transactions across multiple blockchains. 

▶ Why Choose Robinhood Wallet? 
Robinhood Wallet gives you full control over your digital assets while enabling seamless crypto transactions. Enjoy an intuitive experience built for all crypto users. 

▶ Swap Your Favorite Cryptocurrencies 
Manage and trade tens of thousands of popular cryptocurrencies like Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), USDC, and more. 

▶ Easily Buy BTC & DOGE 
Purchase Bitcoin and Dogecoin directly using Robinhood Connect. 

▶ Supported Networks 
Robinhood Wallet supports multiple blockchain networks, including Ethereum, Solana, Polygon, Arbitrum, Optimism, and Bitcoin. 

▶ Effortless Crypto Transfers 
Easily transfer crypto between Robinhood Wallet and Robinhood Crypto. Move assets quickly to external wallets on supported networks with no hidden fees (network fees still apply). 

▶ Complete Asset Control 
Send, receive, and store crypto without restrictions. Robinhood Wallet is non-custodial, meaning you have full ownership of your assets. 

▶ NFT Management 
Securely receive and store your digital collectibles on Robinhood Wallet. 

▶ Connect with Robinhood Crypto App 
Seamlessly connect your Robinhood Crypto and Robinhood Wallet accounts with Robinhood Connect. Buy, sell, and transfer assets effortlessly between both platforms. 

▶ Complete Control & Security 
Your private keys remain yours. Biometric authentication and advanced encryption. 

Download Robinhood Wallet today and take full control of your crypto!

TBC UZ ilovasi — bu istalgan vaqtda moliyaviy masalalarni qulay hal qilishga yordam beradigan mobil onlayn bank. Ilovada to'lov qilish, onlayn kredit olish, kartadan kartaga o'tkazmalar, jismoniy yoki virtual karta buyurish va onlayn omonat ochish imkoni bor.

TBC UZ ilovasida ro'yxatdan o'tishingiz bilanoq mobil bankning barcha funksiyalaridan foydalanishingiz mumkin bo'ladi.

• 100 mln so'mgacha onlayn kredit. Ilovaning o'zida, kafillarsiz, garovsiz va ortiqcha hujjatlarsiz. Kredit olishdan oldin tasdiqlangan stavka bo'yicha ilovadagi kredit kalkulyatorida oylik to'lovlarni hisoblash mumkin.

• 24 oygacha muddatli onlayn omonatlar**. Omonatga har kuni foiz hisoblaymiz va oyda bir marta to'lab beramiz. TBC UZ ilovasiga ulangan istalgan karta orqali omonatni to'ldirish mumkin.

• Pul o'tkazmalari. O'zbekistondagi banklar kartalariga telefon raqami yoki karta raqami orqali pul o'tkazing.

• Onlayn xaridlar va xizmatlarni to'lash uchun Uzcard, Visa va Humo virtual kartalari. Visa Virtual'dan xorijiy to'lovlar uchun, Uzcard va Humo'dan O'zbekistondagi xaridlar uchun foydalanishingiz mumkin.

• Osmon Card kredit kartasi — 50 mln so'mgacha kredit limiti va 55 kungacha imtiyozli davrga ega Humo kartasi. Har qanday xaridni to'lang, imtiyozli davr oxirigacha qarzni qaytarsangiz, foiz to'lamaysiz.

• Onlayn to'lovlar. Mobil aloqa, internet, xizmatlar, kommunal va davlat xizmatlari uchun uydan chiqmasdan to'lov qiling. 


TBC UZ ilovasidagi bank xizmatlari:
- Bank hisobraqami — bir necha daqiqada onlayn hisobraqam oching va ilovada pulingizni boshqaring.
- Salom Card — komissiyasiz pul o'tkazing, xaridlarni to'lang va foydali bonuslarga ega bo'ling.
- TBC Kredit — onlayn kredit javobini 1 minutda*, yashirin komissiyalarsiz bilib oling.
- Osmon Card — xaridlar uchun qulay kredit karta bilan to'lov qiling va 55*** kungacha foiz to'lamang.
- Pul o'tkazmalari — telefon yoki karta raqami orqali istalgan bank kartalariga darhol pul o'tkazing.
- Onlayn to'lovlar — mashhur xizmatlar va servislar uchun ilovaning o'zida komissiyasiz to'lov qiling.



TBC UZ ilovasining 6 mln ortiq foydalanuvchisi bor — siz ham qo'shiling! Ilovani hoziroq yuklab oling va mobil bankingning pul o'tkazmalari, to'lovlar, onlayn omonatlar va kreditlar kabi barcha imkoniyatlaridan foydalaning.


*so'nggi 300 000 foydalanuvchi orasida kredit bo'yicha qaror qabul qilishning o'rtacha vaqti. Aniq qaror qabul qilish vaqti mijozning kredit tarixiga bog'liq va 1 daqiqadan kam yoki ko'proq vaqtni olishi mumkin. Foiz stavkasi 28% dan 49% gacha, muddati 3 oydan 36 oygacha, miqdori 300 ming so'mdan 100 million so'mgacha. Kredit shartlari - tbcbank.uz saytida.


**18% dan 22% gacha stavka. Omonatlar shartlari — tbcbank.uz saytida

***Bu xaridlar uchun 30 kungacha (hisobot davri) va qarzni to'lash uchun hisob-kitob sanasidan boshlab 25 kun (to'lov muddati) — jami 55 kungacha foizsiz
